author: AETerry
title: Fabuland Shop
review:
This is another large Fabuland set that I had from when I was younger. The walls of the building are compose of large single pieces of what's called Juniorized pieces, making it easy for a young child to build and play with the set without it being too complex. There's even a small rectangular base plate to build on and roof pieces

There are two minifigures of a Pig and Fox and lots of little accessories that make for hours of fun.
